title: R & D expenditure of BP 2010 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Expenditure in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
Overall Expenditure in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.

Expenditure in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, gradually decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Expenditure in million U.S. dollars, about 780.0 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Expenditure in million U.S. dollars, of value 391.0 was reported at Year 2017
